title: External debt sustainability and development
text:
United Nations 
A/C.2/80/L.63
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
24 November 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-19244 (E)    251125 
*2519244* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Second Committee 
Agenda item 16 (c) 
Macroeconomic policy questions: external debt sustainability 
and development  
 
 
 
 
 
Denmark:* amendment to draft resolution A/C.2/80/L.12/Rev.1 
 
 
 
 External debt sustainability and development 
 
 
 
Delete operative paragraphs 3, 43 and 45. 
 
 
 
* On behalf of the States Members of the United Nations that are members of the European 
Union.
